install: { [[ -n "${SCRIPT_DOWNLOAD_ROOT_URL:-}" ]] || { echo "ERROR: SCRIPT_DOWNLOAD_ROOT_URL not set in Cursor Secrets" >&2; false; }; } && { echo "[Setup] Downloading from: $SCRIPT_DOWNLOAD_ROOT_URL/setup.sh" && _setup_script=$(curl -fsSL "$SCRIPT_DOWNLOAD_ROOT_URL/setup.sh") && source /dev/stdin <<< "$_setup_script"; } && npm install && echo "[Test] MY_GIT_EMAIL after npm install: ${MY_GIT_EMAIL:-(unset - security check passed)}"
